job_description: Join our team at Sunny Fields Farm! We're looking for energetic Harvest Assistants to help with our seasonal produce. Must have a keen eye for quality and a willingness to work outdoors.

We are seeking a dynamic Sales Associate to join our team at the Downtown Market. Your role will involve showcasing and selling a variety of fresh produce sourced directly from local farms. Excellent customer service skills and knowledge of agricultural products are essential.
Experienced Tractor Operators needed for Village Farms. Seasonal work available. Must have valid driving license and good mechanical aptitude.
Inventory Manager position open at Central Warehouse. Responsible for managing stock levels, supplier relationships, and optimizing storage space. Experience in logistics preferred.
Seeking Fruit Pickers for our Apple Orchards. Work during peak season. Must be able to climb trees and handle delicate fruits carefully.
Quality Assurance Officer needed to ensure the highest standards of our agricultural products. Background in food science or related field desired.
Irrigation Specialist required for managing water resources efficiently in rice paddies. Knowledge of modern irrigation techniques is essential.
Marketing Coordinator role available. Focus on promoting our range of organic farming products. Strong digital marketing skills required.
Animal Caretaker needed for our livestock barns. Responsibilities include feeding, grooming, and health monitoring of animals. Previous experience preferred.
Logistics Manager to oversee the distribution of our agricultural products nationwide. Proven track record in logistics and supply chain management is essential.
Soil Analyst position open for research purposes. Analyze soil samples to determine nutrient content and recommend amendments. Degree in agronomy required.
Product Development Specialist to innovate and develop new organic farming products. Background in chemistry or biology with a passion for sustainability.
Poultry Farmer sought for managing chicken coops. Responsibilities include breeding, egg collection, and general coop maintenance. Experience in poultry farming is a plus.
E-commerce Manager to grow our online presence and sales. Expertise in digital platforms and e-commerce strategies is crucial.
Agronomist available for consultation services. Provide advice on crop selection, soil management, and pest control. Bachelor's degree in agronomy required.
